name: Rotate 'N' Shoot (Kenney Jam Entry)
description:
It seems like the Web Build isn't working :(

Here to the Windows Build (doesn't count as a jam entry): Rotate 'N' Shoot (Windows Version) by Catervus (itch.io)

My Entry to the Kenney Jam 2021!

The Jam's theme was: Rotation 

I had a little spare time and really wanted to make a small game again, so I thought why not? :D 

I hope you enjoy it!
